answers.answer: Hello,here's something I read:ACE has been found in moderately increased levels in a variety of diseases and disorders such as:HIVHistoplasmosis (fungal respiratory disease)Diabetes mellitusHyperthyroidismLymphomaAlcoholic cirrhosisGaucher’s disease (a rare inherited lipid metabolism disorder)TuberculosisLeprosysource= http://www.labtestsonline.org/understanding/analytes/ace/test.html

question: I was recently diagnosed with sarcoidosis and have an ACE level of 76. I also have Rheumatoid Arthritis. What other reasons could an elevated ACE level be from?This discussion is related tohttp://www.medhelp.org/posts/show/282663.
title: ACE levels
